attributes.action: install dropped curbs when installing disabled parking bays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
when a disabled parking bay is installed for a disabled driver, a dropped curb is installed as well.
we have to get our wheelchairs out of the car,on the roadside, then if we are not strong enough to get up over the curb, we have to trundle up the road to drive access and come back again along the curb. this should not be, we should not have to be on the road in a wheelchair, under any cricumstances.
